description: This file defines a class 'DockerApp' that extends 'InfraApp' and encapsulates configuration and methods for managing Docker container applications, including volume mounts, environment variables, container settings, and resource building logic.

classes.name: DockerApp
classes.description: A class representing a Docker application configuration, including container setup, volume mounts, environment variables, and resource building methods.

methods.name: get_container_name
methods.description: Returns the container name, defaulting to the application name if not explicitly set.

methods.name: get_container_context
methods.description: Builds and returns the container context object, including workspace details and requirements file path.

methods.name: get_container_env
methods.description: Generates and returns the environment variables for the container, incorporating various settings and secrets.

methods.name: get_container_volumes
methods.description: Constructs and returns the volume mappings for the container, including workspace, app, resources, and config volumes.

methods.name: get_container_ports
methods.description: Returns the port mappings for the container, including any open port configurations.

methods.name: get_container_command
methods.description: Returns the command to run in the container as a list of strings.

methods.name: build_resources
methods.description: Builds and returns the list of Docker resources (containers, networks) for deployment.

methods.name: get_infra_resources
methods.description: Returns the infrastructure resources associated with this app, such as Docker resources.
